d05e4ede-653c-44a1-9a49-553e96e0dbfe.description: Earners of this designation have developed foundational level skills to effectively describe the concepts fundamental to careers in the world of business, finance, and marketing. They can create a business plan incorporating business concepts, evaluate elements of effective business communication, and apply knowledge of effective business communication. Earners can explain how information systems are used to solve business problems and more.

242abb83-1af8-4b0d-93db-7a1c3c7f05fd.description: Earners of this designation have a foundational level of skills in exploring careers of interest to them. They can describe the impact of individual and personal interests and abilities on career choices. Earners can identify the components of a career plan, connect personal interests and abilities, and academic strengths to personal career options. Then can identify and review resources available in researching job opportunities and individualized career portfolio components.
242abb83-1af8-4b0d-93db-7a1c3c7f05fd.name: Career Readiness

issuer.summary: issued by Reach Cyber Charter School

alignments.name: PA CEW Standard 13.1.5.A
alignments.description: Describe the impact of individual interests and abilities on career choices.

alignments.name: PA CEW Standard 13.1.5.B
alignments.description: Describe the impact of personal interest and abilities on career choices.

alignments.name: PA CEW Standard 13.1.5.G
alignments.description: Identify the components of a career plan, such as but not limited to - Beginnings of a career portfolio; Career goals; Individual interests and abilities; Training/education requirements and costs.

alignments.name: PA CEW Standard 13.1.5.H
alignments.description: Connect personal interests and abilities and academic strengths to personal career options.

alignments.name: PA CEW Standard 13.2.5.B
alignments.description: Identify and review resources available in researching job opportunities.

alignments.name: PA CEW Standard 13.2.5.D
alignments.description: Identify individualized career portfolio components.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Career Skills and Development course.

fde66221-5417-4242-ad44-f193bc244c89.description: Earners of this designation have developed foundational level skills to effectively explain the concepts fundamental for employment in careers related to human needs. They can examine and evaluate the justice system, emerging trends in criminal justice, and define terms related to criminal investigation . Earners can describe the qualities, training, education, and credentialing for a career as a medical assistant, apply principles of medical law, legal concepts, and more.
fde66221-5417-4242-ad44-f193bc244c89.name: Human Services I

issuer.summary: issued by Reach Cyber Charter School

badge_template_activities.title: Complete two of the following courses successfully: Anatomy & Physiology, Criminal Investigation, Health, Safety & Nutrition, Introduction Criminal Justice, Introduction to Childhood Education, Introduction to Medical Assisting, Medical Law & Ethics, Medical Terminology, Personal Fitness, Forensic Science, Geography, World Geography, Psychology, AP Psychology, AP Macroeconomics, AP Microeconomics, AP US Government, AP US History, MOS Word, MOS PowerPoint, MOS Excel

bfa2e812-b8c0-423a-9cdb-c874a98cdfe3.description: Earners of this designation have developed foundational skills to effectively describe the basic principles and elements of art as well as an understanding of camera functions, and techniques. They can critique art, create movement in a two-dimensional artistic space, shoot quality photos, interpret visual representations, communicate visually through effective layout and interface design, and more.
bfa2e812-b8c0-423a-9cdb-c874a98cdfe3.name: Arts, A/V Technology & Communications I

issuer.summary: issued by Reach Cyber Charter School

8e296fd5-98a4-44f8-bb57-3fe0fe99e16a.description: Earners of this credential know their high school resources support system, realize the importance of conducting themselves with integrity, and understand the importance of high school graduation. Earners can also identify and practice general strategies that contribute to their success.
8e296fd5-98a4-44f8-bb57-3fe0fe99e16a.name: Freshman Success

issuer.summary: issued by Reach Cyber Charter School

2fa868a3-6d6b-47ce-ba7a-5ff96d383784.description: Earners of this designation have developed foundational level skills to effectively explain the concepts fundamental to careers in science and health. Earners will be able to apply fundamental concepts underlying astronomy, explain the meaning of fitness and wellness, analyze wellness issues, describe various aspects of nutrition, and identify common injuries and first aid emergencies. They can conduct various scientific procedures using technology, and more.
2fa868a3-6d6b-47ce-ba7a-5ff96d383784.name: Health Science I

issuer.summary: issued by Reach Cyber Charter School

badge_template_activities.title: Complete two of the following courses successfully: Introduction to Astronomy; Health, Safety & Nutrition; Personal Fitness; Astronomy; Earth Science; Environmental Science; Marine Science; AP Biology; AP Environmental Science; Geography; World Geography; Psychology; AP Psychology, MOS Word, MOS PowerPoint, MOS Excel

497ce6b1-6bf2-40f4-beef-179de99e729b.description: Earners have completed either an internship, job shadow, pre-apprenticeship, or career mentoring experience. They have completed all necessary paperwork to document their experience for the career of their interest.
497ce6b1-6bf2-40f4-beef-179de99e729b.name: Industry-Based Learner

issuer.summary: issued by Reach Cyber Charter School

badge_template_activities.title: Completed either an internship, job shadow, pre-apprenticeship, or career mentoring session and all required paperwork.

2626b8eb-6d10-4872-80fa-ed621edc3b70.description: Earners of this designation have developed a foundational level of skills to effectively explain the concepts fundamental to careers in science, technology, engineering, and manufacturing. Earners can describe the various fields of engineering including Civil, Mechanical, Chemical, and Biological, and how technology impacts the environment.They can also acquire information and systematically apply decision-making processes to real-life situations using geographical concepts.
2626b8eb-6d10-4872-80fa-ed621edc3b70.name: STEM I

issuer.summary: issued by Reach Cyber Charter School

alignments.name: PA Science & Technology and Engineering Education 3.1|Biological Sciences
alignments.description: Biology of organisms and cells concerns living things, their appearance, different types of life, the scope of their similarities and differences, where they live and how they live.

alignments.name: PA Science & Technology and Engineering Education 3.2|Physical Sciences: Chemistry & Physics
alignments.description: Physics and chemistry involve the study of objects and their properties. Students examine changes to materials during mixing, freezing, heating and dissolving and then learn how to observe and measure results.

alignments.name: PA Science & Technology and Engineering Education 3.3|Earth & Space Sciences
alignments.description: The dynamics of earth science include the studies of forces of nature that build up and wear down the earth’s surface. Space science is concerned with the origin and evolution of the universe. The understanding of these concepts uses principles from physical sciences, geography and mathematics.

alignments.name: PA Science & Technology and Engineering Education 3.4|Technology & Engineering Education
alignments.description: Technology and Engineering Education is the use of accumulated knowledge to process resources to meet human needs and improve the quality of life. It includes developing, producing, using and assessing technologies.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete two of the following courses successfully: Astronomy, Environmental Science, Earth Science, Geography & Society, World Geography, Marine Science, AP Biology, AP Environmental Science, Concepts of Engineering, AP Computer Science, Calculus, Statistics, AP Calculus, AP Statistics, Any Microsoft Office Specialist Certification, Any Microsoft Technology Associate Certification. Successful completion of the ABC Keystone Pre-apprenticeship.

alignments.name: Pennsylvania Mathematics Standards for 3rd - 8th grades
alignments.description: Mathematics in Pennsylvania stresses both procedural skills and conceptual understanding to ensure students are learning and applying the critical information they need to succeed at higher levels. The introduction at each grade level articulates a small number of critical mathematical areas that should be the focus for that grade.

badge_template_activities.title: Completed Universal Screener in IXL.

36012b39-6c3c-493b-aaa6-89ab1154df71.description: Earners of this credential have successfully completed the Universal Screener in the IXL Program within the third window.

2f84486e-6e12-4766-891e-63ba8da073dd.description: Earners of this designation have developed advanced level skills to effectively explain the concepts fundamental to careers in science, technology, engineering and manufacturing. Earners can describe the various fields of engineering including Civil, Mechanical, Chemical, and Biological, and how technology impacts the environment.They can also acquire information and systematically apply decision-making processes to real-life situations using geographical concepts.
2f84486e-6e12-4766-891e-63ba8da073dd.name: STEM III

issuer.summary: issued by Reach Cyber Charter School

alignments.name: PA Science & Technology and Engineering Education 3.1|Biological Sciences
alignments.description: Biology of organisms and cells concerns living things, their appearance, different types of life, the scope of their similarities and differences, where they live and how they live.

alignments.name: PA Science & Technology and Engineering Education 3.2|Physical Sciences: Chemistry & Physics
alignments.description: Physics and chemistry involve the study of objects and their properties. Students examine changes to materials during mixing, freezing, heating and dissolving and then learn how to observe and measure results.

alignments.name: PA Science & Technology and Engineering Education 3.3|Earth & Space Sciences
alignments.description: The dynamics of earth science include the studies of forces of nature that build up and wear down the earth’s surface. Space science is concerned with the origin and evolution of the universe. The understanding of these concepts uses principles from physical sciences, geography and mathematics.

alignments.name: PA Science & Technology and Engineering Education 3.4|Technology & Engineering Education
alignments.description: Technology and Engineering Education is the use of accumulated knowledge to process resources to meet human needs and improve the quality of life. It includes developing, producing, using and assessing technologies.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete six of the following courses successfully: Astronomy, Environmental Science, Earth Science, Geography & Society, World Geography, Marine Science, AP Biology, AP Environmental Science, Concepts of Engineering, AP Computer Science, Calculus, Statistics, AP Calculus, AP Statistics, Any Microsoft Office Specialist Certification, Any Microsoft Technology Associate Certification. Successful completion of the ABC Keystone Pre-apprenticeship.
STEM II

6a331391-930e-46f5-9e28-fd3b4f2cc834.description: Earners of this designation have advanced level skills to effectively provide foundational knowledge and skills to meaningfully participate in our increasingly digital society, economy, and culture.
6a331391-930e-46f5-9e28-fd3b4f2cc834.name: STEM Specialist

issuer.summary: issued by Reach Cyber Charter School

alignments.name: Pennsylvania Department of Education|Career Ready Skills
alignments.description: The Pennsylvania Department of Education identifies the following skills and knowledge areas key to college and/or career readiness in the 21st Century: Self-Awareness and Self-Management, Establishing and Maintaining Relationships, and Social Problem-Solving Skills.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Computer Coding and Building with Raspberry Pi.
Complete a STEM Independent Study.
Participate in at least one STEM Camp.
